fields.label: Google Sheets ID
fields.description: Enter the Google Sheets ID (the long string from the URL)

fields.label: Google Sheets API Key
fields.description: Enter your Google Sheets API key (for reading sheet information only)

fields.label: Service Account JSON
fields.description: Complete Google service account JSON credentials (required for updating data). Download from Google Cloud Console.

fields.label: Sheet Name
fields.description: Select the sheet/tab to update (will populate after entering Sheet ID and API Key)

fields.label: Key Column
fields.description: Select the column to match for updating a row (populated dynamically after selecting sheet)

fields.label: Key Value
fields.description: Select the value to match in the key column (populated dynamically after selecting column)

fields.label: Row Data
fields.description: Edit the values for this row. Each item contains the column name and the value for that column.
